level.text: A certified-registered nurse anesthetist shall adhere to the standards set forth in the American Association of Nurse Anesthetists’ (AANA) “Code of Ethics,” as they may be amended or republished from time to time.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 36 DCR 3491, 3492 (May 12, 1989); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 49 DCR 11751 (December 27, 2002); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 51 DCR 7228 (July 23, 2004).
